sys_remote_update_set.description:
Modify the email in the IT Equipment Return request to include this address information in the email users get
Can you modify the email in the IT Equipment Return request to include this address information in the email users get? Right before the "IMPORTANT" sections.
Ship To Address: End User Support, 14th Floor 545 Washington Blvd. Jersey City, NJ 07310
